alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northwest Aroostook; Southeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 07 at 9:43PM EST until February 09 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TUESDAY TO MIDNIGHT EST TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches expected. * WHERE...Aroostook, Northern Piscataquis and Northern Penobscot Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM Tuesday to midnight EST Tuesday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northwest Aroostook; Southeast Aroostook
